Headline: Green Line Service Delayed near Harlem/Lake
ShortDescription: Green Line trains are experiencing major delays due to police activity near Harlem/Lake. Crews working to restore service.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Green Line trains are experiencing major delays due to police activity near Harlem/Lake. Crews working to restore service.

Bus shuttles are available from Harlem to Clark/Lake.

Personnel are working to restore service. Allow extra travel time.
